name: Canon Run
description:
Hi there! this if my first time developing a game and wanted to test the waters with unity. Enjoy this somewhat fun infiratingly addictive runner. Big thanks to my friend Max Trollinger for helping me piece this thing together. 

This is max's Itch page (Check out BoozeHound!)

https://maxpremo.itch.io/

"A and D" to move and "Space" to jump (there is a small bug that causes a super jump but we'll call this an intended feature)

Post you're highscores below lets see who can master these "mechanics"  Ps ignore the "infintity" route. (probaly will patch this soon)
